thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses USA | www.smartbuyglasses.com
thread.title: KathyCustomer

author: KathyCustomer
title: KathyCustomer
text: Shopped for frames for a few months. Finally found Fendi in a local opticians. When I priced out the frames with Varilux lenses I was shocked. Went home and was happily surprised to find the identical, fully licensed frame for less than half the optician's cost. Too good to be true???! Nope!!!! Frames arrived quickly and were exactly as described.
